channel.title: NPC's look south? [317]
channel.description:
Hello,
Heres the story, I start up my server and then the NPC's all load in. After about 5 minutes they start twitching and when i'm fighting them they continuously look away from me in the southern direction as if their paranoid. I checked everything in my NPCHandler and NPC.java, nothing seems to look like its causing this. So i'm asking if anyone else had ever come up with a fix for this or had seen this problem. If you ask me, IT's ANNOYING! Any help is appreciated.
~Coelho

item.title: NPC's look south? [317]
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

You mean, they dont look ou when u att them?
if so, give me a download of your nPChandler.java

item.title: NPC's look south? [317]
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

Ah i’m not having a problem with that. What I meant was that my NPCs are glitched so they constantly look south.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's look south? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

There was another post on this, I found it quickly using the search bar, try it next time bro =).

NPCHandler, newNPC method

Quote

      if (newNPC.npcType == NPCID) {
         if ((newNPC.absX == CoordX) && (newNPC.absY == CoordY)) {
            newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX + 2, newNPC.absY);
         }
      }

NPCID - Id of the NPC
CoordX - NPC X
CoordY - NPC Y

  • 2 - New direction, -1, +2, +3, +4

Never assume something is impossible

Credits to: Deathchaos9

Read full topic
